Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi singled in the 10th inning for the go-ahead hit, scoring Miguel Vargas and securing a 4-3 win for the White Sox.
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox avoided a record-breaking 121st loss for the second straight game.
Post-Match Reflections: Grady Sizemore, the White Sox interim manager, emphasized that the team remains focused on competing despite the losing streak.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Angels matched a franchise record with their 95th loss, a mark shared by the 1968 and 1980 teams.
